verses.verse: <S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> of every one of them a <S%H4294>rod<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, of all their <S%H5387>princes<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%>: <S%H3789>write<s%> thou every <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> upon his <S%H4294>rod<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> upon the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>: for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> shall be for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.
And thou shalt lay them <S%H3240>up<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, where I will meet with <S%H3259>you<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H376>pass<s%>, that the man's <S%H4294>rod<s%>, whom I shall <S%H977>choose<s%>, shall <S%H6524>blossom<s%>: and I will make to <S%H7918>cease<s%> from me the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whereby they murmur against <S%H3885>you<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and every one of their <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H5387>apiece<s%>, for each prince <S%H259>one<s%>, according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, even <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H4294>rods<s%>: and the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H4294>rods<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> laid <S%H3240>up<s%> the <S%H4294>rods<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness<s%>.

And it came to <S%H4283>pass<s%>, that on the morrow <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness<s%>; <S%H4294>and<s%>, behold, the rod of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> was <S%H6524>budded<s%>, and brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6525>buds<s%>, and <S%H6692>bloomed<s%> <S%H6731>blossoms<s%>, and <S%H1580>yielded<s%> <S%H8247>almonds<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> all the <S%H4294>rods<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and they <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H7725>Bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for a <S%H226>token<s%> against the <S%H4805>rebels<s%>; and thou shalt quite take <S%H3615>away<s%> their <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> from <S%H4191>me<s%>, that they die not.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3068>so<s%>: as the Lord <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>him<s%>, so did he.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1478>Behold<s%>, we die, we <S%H6>perish<s%>, we all <S%H6>perish<s%>.
Whosoever cometh any thing <S%H7131>near<s%> unto the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>: shall we be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> with <S%H1478>dying<s%>?
